DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate Ubiquitin C-terminal Hydrolase-L1 ( UCH-L1 ) Glial Fibrillary Acidic Protein ( GFAP ) biomarker level population CT-positive subject ( determined independent Neuroimaging Review Committee ) present acutely traumatic brain injury ( Glasgow Coma Scale score 9-15 ) .
DOC.brief_title: EVALUATION OF BIOMARKERS OF TRAUMATIC BRAIN INJURY EXTENSION STUDY
DOC.criteria: The Subject least 18 year age screening . The Subject present Health Care Facility ( HCF ) Emergency Department ( ED ) suspect traumatically induce head injury , result insult head external force . A Glasgow Coma Scale score 915 time Informed Consent . The subject CTpositive acute intracranial lesion ( ) base local neuroradiologist 's review subject 's head CT scan . The CT scan CT report use determine eligibility must available . The blood sample collect close time head injury possible , later 12 hour . The Subject legal representative willing undergo Informed Consent process prior enrollment study Participating interventional , therapeutic clinical study may affect result study ( observational study would acceptable ) . Time injury determine . Primary diagnosis ischemic hemorrhagic stroke . Venipuncture feasible ( i.e. , skin integrity compromise venipuncture site , blood vessel calcification ( i.e. , IV drug user , advanced atherosclerosis ) upper limb miss ( congenital amputee ) ) . The subject neurodegenerative disease neurological disorder include dementia , Parkinson 's disease , multiple sclerosis , seizure disorder , brain tumor . The subject history neurosurgery within last 30 day . Administration blood transfusion head injury prior study blood draw . The subject female pregnant lactating . The Subject otherwise determine Investigator unsuitable candidate participation . If criterion applies , reason must provide
